((OOC: My only character in this neck of the woods is Myrmidon, and he
is inside with Dark Rodimus, Perceptor, Malice and Twilight . . . and
who ever else??))


BIC: 

Myrmidon had moved with Perceptor keeping up easilly with the Predicon.
He watched as Malice had attempted to attack Dark Rodimus but was
easilly taken by Perceptor. 

Shifting into robot mode Myrmidon nodded at Perceptor and Dark Rodimus
and then turned his gaze to the 'apparently' fallen Malice. He had seen
how the soldier fought and then escaped. He being brought down by a
single shot was surprising, and he did not trust it at all!

"Becareful of that one." He said in dark tones, indicating malice with
a keenly sharp taloned index finger "He could be faking his injuries."

Preston
(Myrmidon)
